    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void animate()
      Animates the actors Enemy and the pacman depending on his current state The method takes their sprite and draws a rectangle around the desired frame After that it goes to next one and repeats that
      void resetTmp()
      This is needed in the HUD, when PacMan died and regained a life in the same level.
      void update(float dt)
      This method adjusts the speed for the animation depending on whose sprite is chosen

    • Constructor Detail

      • Animation

        public Animation(Actor actor,
                 Assets ASSETS,
                 float animationSpeed,
                 MapScreen screen,
                 int frameCount)
        Create a new animation
        Parameters:
        actor - the actor
        ASSETS - asset management
        animationSpeed - the speed for the animation
        screen - the screen in which the animation will be created
        frameCount - number of frames of a sprite

    • Method Detail

      • animate

        public void animate()
        Animates the actors Enemy and the pacman depending on his current state The method takes their sprite and draws a rectangle around the desired frame After that it goes to next one and repeats that

      • resetTmp

        public void resetTmp()
        This is needed in the HUD, when PacMan died and regained a life in the same level. It avoids bugs on the life displaying.

      • update

        public void update(float dt)
        This method adjusts the speed for the animation depending on whose sprite is chosen
        Parameters:
        dt - time parameter used by libGDX
